title: 公安部就网络犯罪防治法公开征求意见
description:
据央视新闻客户端消息，为有效遏制网络犯罪源头、整治网络犯罪生态，提升人民群众网络安全感和满意度，经充分调研论证，公安部起草了《网络犯罪防治法（征求意见稿）》，现向社会公开征求意见。意见反馈截止时间为2026年3月2日。

附件：1. 网络犯罪防治法（征求意见稿）

2. 关于起草《网络犯罪防治法（征求意见稿）》的说明

公安部

2026年1月31日

附件1

网络犯罪防治法（征求意见稿）

第一章 总 则

第一条 为了预防、遏制和治理网络犯罪活动，维护国家安全、社会稳定和网络秩序，保护公民和组织的合法权益，…
en:
The Ministry of Public Security publicly solicits opinions on the Cybercrime Prevention and Control Law. According to the CCTV News client, in order to effectively curb the sources of cybercrime, rectify the cybercrime ecology, and improve the people's online sense of security and satisfaction, after thorough research and demonstration, the Ministry of Public Security has drafted the "Cybercrime Prevention and Control Law (Draft for Comments)" and is now publicly soliciting opinions from the public. The deadline for feedback is March 2, 2026.

Attachment: 1. Cybercrime Prevention and Control Law (Draft for Comments)

2. Instructions on drafting the "Law on the Prevention and Control of Cybercrime (Draft for Comments)"

Ministry of Public Security

January 31, 2026

Attachment 1

Cybercrime Prevention and Control Law (Draft for Comments)

Chapter 1 General Provisions

Article 1 In order to prevent, contain and manage cybercrime activities, maintain national security, social stability and online order, and protect the legitimate rights and interests of citizens and organizations,…
